name: 3dLSS
author: AFNI Developers
description: Least-Squares-Sum (LSS) estimation tool from a -stim_times_IM matrix for multivoxel pattern classification analyses.

inputs.description: Read the matrix 'mmm', which should have been output from 3dDeconvolve via the '-x1D' option. It should have included exactly one '-stim_times_IM' option.
inputs.name: Matrix File

inputs.description: Just compute the estimator matrix -- to be saved with '-save1D'.
inputs.name: No Data Flag

inputs.description: Dataset 'MMM' will be used as a mask for the input; voxels outside the mask will not be fit by the regression model.
inputs.name: Mask File

inputs.description: If you don't know what this does by now, please don't use this program.
inputs.name: Automask

inputs.description: Prefix name for the output dataset; this dataset will contain ONLY the LSS estimates of the beta weights for the '-stim_times_IM' stimuli.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Save the estimator vectors to a 1D formatted file named 'qqq'.
inputs.name: Save Estimators File

output-files.description: Output dataset containing the LSS estimates of the beta weights for the '-stim_times_IM' stimuli.
output-files.name: Output Dataset

output-files.description: Estimator vectors saved in a 1D formatted file.
output-files.name: Estimator Vectors File
